# Server Rules This is a Wizard's Den server, one of the official Space Station 14 servers. A ban in this server is a ban from all Wizard's Den servers, which may be appealed at https://forum.spacestation14.com/c/ban-appeals/appeals-game/40
[color=#ff0000]Only Core Rules apply on this server.[/color] MRP Amendments do NOT apply.
## Core Rules These rules apply at all times, including between rounds unless otherwise specified.

No sexual or shock content" link="RuleC4"] - [textlink="5. No communication beyond In-Character methods" link="RuleC5"] - [textlink="6. Do not discuss or evade bans" link="RuleC6"] - [textlink="7.
